title: Victorious Skin

embed.description: Over the course of the season, you felt both sides of a stolen Baron. You carried hard and took the occasional ride in a teammate's backpack. The struggle is real, but victory is sweet. Now it's time for one last push.

body:
I'm surprised there isn't already another thread discussing it. I thought this was something people were very interested in.

Anyway, on topic. We know it's for a marksmen (Riot's already confirmed this) and I *think* we can rule out Azir. There's a lot of people saying it's Sivir, and I can kind of see that, but, honestly, first thing I thought when I saw it was "Quinn", and that definitely sounds like something Riot would do.

What's your opinions?

replies.body:
If you think its someone other than Sivir you're an idiot... her boomerang is literally staring you in the face...

Also the VIctorious and Championship skins are loosley based of "high impact" champions from that season.
Quinn is still an outcast.

> If you think its someone other than Sivir you're an idiot... her boomerang is literally staring you in the face...

You assume it's Sivir's Boomerang that's shown but that may not be the case. There are a few things it could be, Sivir's Boomerang is jut the most likely.

> Also the VIctorious and Championship skins are loosley based of "high impact" champions from that season.

That's what Riot have done in the past, yes, but they're not above changing the way they handle particular kinds of skins. Just a few days ago they stopped giving away server skins for free (as far as we know, probably just for OCE). It's not impossible that the Victorious skin could be for a champion that didn't have a high impact in the season.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Rf0Q5n2k,comment-id=00040001,timestamp=2015-10-03T01:49:12.905+0000)
>
> You assume it's Sivir's Boomerang that's shown but that may not be the case. There are a few things it could be, Sivir's Boomerang is jut the most likely.
> 
> That's what Riot have done in the past, yes, but they're not above changing the way they handle particular kinds of skins. Just a few days ago they stopped giving away server skins for free (as far as we know, probably just for OCE). It's not impossible that the Victorious skin could be for a champion that didn't have a high impact in the season.

You forget that she also looks Sivir and is wearing Sivir's headband thingy, check her classic splash art and then look at the teaser.
Well, you can't actually tell whether it's a headband or a helmet because of the shadows at the top. Not to mention, champion's skins don't always look the same as their classics.

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Rf0Q5n2k,comment-id=0004000100000000,timestamp=2015-10-03T05:19:05.826+0000)
>
> Well, you can't actually tell whether it's a headband or a helmet because of the shadows at the top. Not to mention, champion's skins don't always look the same as their classics.

Okay...

They explained the server skin thing. They already gave away the Ziggs skin for free and instead of simply being apologetic about being late and giving us a 2nd free skin, Riot said, "nah, we don't give out 2 skins for free".

They made up some excuse about donating to charity. But that again just suits Riot, because now they can say "hey look at us, we gave $100K" to charity, we're awesome.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Rf0Q5n2k,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-10-03T01:17:30.514+0000)
>
> If you think its someone other than Sivir you're an idiot... her boomerang is literally staring you in the face...
> 
> Also the VIctorious and Championship skins are loosley based of "high impact" champions from that season.
> Quinn is still an outcast.

^This.

It's possible, certainly not likely but possible. I did take a look at the design of Quinn's crossbow in all her skins and they are quite different aesthetically, and some do have quite large pieces hanging off the side which could be what is seen in the image. Just keep in mind, it's extremely unlikely it's for Quinn.
Does Kayle count as a marksmen? It kinda looks like her to me
No. Kayle is primary Fighter and secondary Support. I can see what you mean though.
yeah i initially thought it was kayle
It looks like sivirs headband thing aswell
I wish it was quinn, but riot hates her

Well, I'll just say it is Sivir. I'm unranked trash this season (probably Bronze) but I'm damn well allowed to have an opinion so here I go. I am surprised it was not Lucian, maybe he has fallen off this season I don't know because I don't particularly care for the "pro" scene that this game tries its hardest to promote as a sport but I digress.

Sivir has had two skins in recent memory on op of all her others and I really think Riot need to add something special to this one. Riot have generally made the Victorious skins pretty cool looking, although Janna's was pretty dull until the sweeping visual touch up changes brought it in line with the others. The problem I have with Riot's recent skin releases such as the Warden skins and the OCE Kass skin is that they look like Victorious wannabee skins (and yes, the fact that Sivir is among them creates ludicrous irony at the thought as she's getting one now).

As long as Riot hide or fix Sivir's broken neck that can easily be seen on any skin that isn't her base afaik it should be in good hands.

THANK GOD IT ISN'T AZIR!!! thank you riot :D
i now have at least another year to try and get to gold :P
To me it looks like a very realistic Lux :) although if it is a marksman, Sivir would be nice.
